page.title: 18ATTLEBOROUGH BYPASS
page.content: THE ATTLEBOROUGH BYPASS WAS OPENED IN THE SPRING OF 1985.IT WAS BUILT AS A MUCH NEEDED RELIEF ROAD FOR THE TOWN OF ATTLEBOROUGH. THE ROAD HAS BEEN THE SUBJECT OF MUCH COTROVERSY BEING MAINLY SINGLE-CARRIAGEWAY APART FROM ONE VERY SHORT DUAL-CARRIAGEWAY SECTION.THERE HAS ALREADY BEEN ONE{FATAL CRASH BETWEEN A FRENCH LORRY AND A COACH.SEVERAL PEOPLE WERE KILLED IN THE CRASH AND LOCAL POLITICIANS AND MEDIA ARE NOW STATING THAT THE ROAD IS {UNSAFE}AND SHOULD HAVE BEEN DUALLED FOR ITS ENTIRE LENGTH. IT IS YET ANOTHER FACTOR IN THE CONTINUING CAMPAIGN TO HAVE THE{A11 {TRUNK ROAD IMPROVED,}OF WHICH THE BYPASS FORMS A SECTION. IT IS THOUGHT BY MANY TO BE THE WORST AND MOST DANGEROUS TRUNK ROAD IN THE COUNTRY.
